translations: n.[机] 中心立轴；主要人物

sentences.sentence: AOL became the kingpin and along came the Internet.
sentences.translation: AOL成了主脑角色，继而诞生了互联网。

sentences.sentence: But there is no kingpin on the "most wanted" posters.
sentences.translation: 但是其中没有最高通缉令上的中心人物。

sentences.sentence: So the most important person in a project or business is the kingpin.
sentences.translation: 所以在一个项目或者交易中的最重要人物就是“中央木柱”。
